verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:1
verses.text: And the child Samuel ministered unto the Lord before Eli. And the word of the Lord was precious in those days; there was no open vision.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:2
verses.text: And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim, that he could not see;

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:3
verses.text: And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the Lord, where the ark of God was, and Samuel was laid down to sleep;

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:4
verses.text: That the Lord called Samuel: and he answered, Here am I.
